title: Tax Day: If 10% Is Good Enough For Jesus... | Daily Best of April 18
description:
Tax Day: If 10% Is Good Enough For Jesus... | Daily Best of April 18 | Rick & Bubba

It's tax day 2022 and if 10% is good enough for Jesus, it ought to be enough for Uncle Sam. We give a $100 to the person who calls in with the largest tax debt. The legendary bluegrass band, "Three On A String" performs live in studio. We recap Easter, the debut of the USFL, and Bananaball in Birmingham last weekend. Plus, Tim Tebow joins to discuss his gig as Grand Marshall of the upcoming Honda Indy Grand Prix. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Rick and Bubba Show
